meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fanatical.
meanings.sent1: Her extreme fanaticalnesses about the band made her attend every concert.
meanings.sent2: The fanaticalnesses of the group of supporters was evident in their loud cheers.
meanings.sent3: His fanaticalnesses for collecting stamps led to a room full of albums.
meanings.sent4: The fanaticalnesses of the chef for perfection resulted in exquisite dishes.
meanings.sent5: The fanaticalnesses of the fitness trainer motivated her clients to push their limits.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a fanatical person.
meanings.sent1: The fanaticalnesses of the protester was evident in his passionate speeches.
meanings.sent2: Her fanaticalnesses towards her favorite team often led to heated debates.
meanings.sent3: The fanaticalnesses of the movie buff made him watch every film on opening night.
meanings.sent4: His fanaticalnesses for cleanliness made him scrub the floors daily.
meanings.sent5: The fanaticalnesses of the activist inspired others to join the cause.
